item.description:
DESCRIPTION: This third meeting will be dedicated to finalize retreat workshop plans and begin assigning responsibilities for creating samples and developing supply lists.

 

Only people interested in planning the retreat should attend.


COST: Free

TIME: 2pm - 4pm


AMENITIES: Free parking. Table space and a chair. Access to a fridge, microwave, toaster oven, kitchen sink and restroom. Dinner in or out, if people are interested.

CANCELLATIONS: In the unlikely event that we need to cancel---or even if we're just getting a late start--we'll post a message on the Web site and e-mail everyone who's RSVP'd "yes." So to be on the safe side, please check the Web site and your inbox before departing for ArtStudio 360!

group.name: New England Artist Trading Cards Plus (ATCs+) Meetup Group

item.name: Retreat Planning
